Text:
There are no english subtitles - neither hardcoded 
nor separate. Do you have english subs? I only found spanish subs online.
where did you find the spanish subs?
i will seed this permanently too, if a seeder comes back. this is the must-see doc on allende's chile...

Any confirmation on english subs?
I see a few online but there are a few versions of these movies around out there.

Can someone please confirm that there are english subtitles in these?
I downloaded a different version of this documentary and spent ages hunting down resynced subs for part 1 & 3. Unforuntately I can't seem to find proper subs for part 2.
This version is horrible: Not only the quality is at most a 4 out of 10, the sound is out of synch. There is another outright good version out there, look for it.
